business_description: SanLei Premium Trout is a commercial-scale rainbow trout farm located on the edge of the Katse Dam in Lesotho, producing high-quality trout for local and export markets, including South Africa, Japan, and the USA. The company adheres to sustainable aquaculture practices and has achieved Best Aquaculture Practices certification.
transactions: Mergence Investment Managers (Lesotho) acquired the remaining 51% of the shares in SanLei Premium Trout in November 2024.
